Namespace quickpool::mem::padding_impl¶

Contents

  • Detailed Description

  • Classes

  • Functions

Detailed Description¶

Padding char[]s always must hold at least one char. If the size of the object ends at an alignment point, we don’t want to pad one extra byte however. The construct below ensures that padding bytes are only added if necessary.

Classes¶

  • Struct empty_struct

  • Template Struct padding

  • Template Struct padding_bytes
